Posts.Content: Hi, this is my first time posting on her. I wondered if anyone had any advise or tips to help with the disgusting taste I have most of the time. It is difficult to drink the required amount of fluid when everything tastes so bad. Food is a problem too. I am about to have my third chemo session out of six, so have a long way to go. I would be appreciative of any advise x
Posts.Title: Everything tastes so bad!!!!!
